description.p: Synaptic is a graphical package management tool based on GTK and APT. Synaptic enables you to install, upgrade and remove software packages in a user-friendly way.
Besides these basic functions the following features are provided:

ul.li: Search and filter the list of available packages
Edit the list of used repositories
Download the latest changelog of a package
Configure packages through the debconf system
Browse all available documentation related to a package
